      • addDrink

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                path="/drink/new/{DrinkId}/{alcPercent}/{volume}/{fkuser}")
public void addDrink​(@PathVariable("DrinkId")
                     java.lang.String DrinkId,
                     @PathVariable("alcPercent")
                     int alcPercent,
                     @PathVariable("volume")
                     int volume,
                     @PathVariable("fkuser")
                     java.lang.String fkuser)
        Adds a drink to the database
        Parameters:
        DrinkId - - the name of the drink
        alcPercent - - the drink's percent of alcohol
        volume - - the total amount in ml
        fkuser - - the user who had the drink

      • listAllDrinks

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                path="/drink")
public java.util.List<Drink> listAllDrinks()
        Displays all the drinks currently in the database
        Returns:
        r - a list of all the drinks stored

        Parameters:
        DrinkId - - the name of the drink
        Returns:

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                path="/drink/check/{User}")
public boolean isSober​(@PathVariable("User")

        Parameters:

        Returns:
